#summary INSTALLATION
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
= Installation =

# Download and unpack library database from [http://code.google.com/p/libraryclient/downloads/list Downloads]

# Put lib.db on the root of your external storage folder (/sdcard/)

# Download and install application from [http://code.google.com/p/libraryclient/downloads/list Downloads]

# Run it!

PS. [http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=4101] через цю багу при інсталяції Android попереджає про доступ до Phone calls
